feature.title:
If the phone your trying to import your contacts from does not support Bluetooth, follow the steps outlined below:
1. Insert your SIM card into the phone you are importing your contacts from
2. Open contacts
3. Copy contacts to SIM card
4. Eject SIM card and insert it into your Xiaomi device
On your Xiaomi device:
1. Open Contacts
2. Go to Menu > Import/export contacts > Import from storage
3. Follow the onscreen instructions
